title: Meditation: Spacious, Clear Awareness
itunes:title: Meditation: Spacious, Clear Awareness
description: Meditation: Spacious, Clear Awareness - This meditation begins with a breath that calms and collects the attention, and then a body scan that enables us to awaken our senses. Finally, we relax open fully to include the changing flow of sounds and sensations, in a spacious, clear awareness.
